com.davidbracewell.io.structured

Class StructuredWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.davidbracewell.io.structured.StructuredWriter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CSVWriter, JSONWriter, XMLWriter

extends Object
implements Closeable
    The interface Structured writer.

    David B. Bracewell
